import React from 'react'; const HarmonyLogo = ({ size = 40, className = "", showText = true, theme = "primary" }) => { const themes = { primary: { primary: "#1e40af", secondary: "#dc2626", accent: "#059669", gold: "#f59e0b" }, white: { primary: "#ffffff", secondary: "#f8fafc", accent: "#f1f5f9", gold: "#fbbf24" }, dark: { primary: "#3b82f6", secondary: "#ef4444", accent: "#10b981", gold: "#fbbf24" } }; const colors = themes[theme] || themes.primary; return (
{/* Enhanced Logo SVG */}
{/* School Name and Motto */} {showText && (

Harmony Learning

INSTITUTE

"Excellence in Education"

)}
); }; export default HarmonyLogo;
